title: Google\Cloud\Dataflow\V1beta3\SdkHarnessContainerImage
name: SdkHarnessContainerImage
description:
Defines a SDK harness container for executing Dataflow pipelines.

Generated from protobuf message google.dataflow.v1beta3.SdkHarnessContainerImage

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.container_image
params.description: A docker container image that resides in Google Container Registry.

params.name: data.use_single_core_per_container
params.description: If true, recommends the Dataflow service to use only one core per SDK container instance with this image. If false (or unset) recommends using more than one core per SDK container instance with this image for efficiency. Note that Dataflow service may choose to override this property if needed.

params.name: data.environment_id
params.description: Environment ID for the Beam runner API proto Environment that corresponds to the current SDK Harness.

params.name: data.capabilities
params.description: The set of capabilities enumerated in the above Environment proto. See also https://github.com/apache/beam/blob/master/model/pipeline/src/main/proto/beam_runner_api.proto
